data.text: @usufrahil 1/3 Thanks for your tweet Yousuf and I can appreciate your disappointment about delay on your flight and for the lack of assistance from our staff. I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. Delays happen however I’m sorry to hear that you were not properly updated.

@Wolfry I appreciate its frustrating when your flight to Singapore. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, but not always possible to do so due to many reasons. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M
@Coleee121 Hi there, I’m sorry to hear about your recent Jetstar experience. We’d like to check this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Maria

@joxsky Hi Joko, thanks for your tweet. I understand that there’s a typo on your booking and would like to have it fixed. Please send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we could assist. Thanks -Cy

urls.title: Dangerous goods | Jetstar
urls.description: Don't risk flying with a dangerous item in your baggage. Here's all the information you need to know about Jetstar's dangerous goods policy before you fly.

data.text: @clem_sa66 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. Upon checking, I can advise that you can bring the batteries listed on the photo you sent. You can also check our page here https://t.co/rBJ7RfugMZ for further details. Thanks - Lee

@kaye_kikay Hi Kaye, thanks for your tweet. I’m concerned to hear about the issues you’re getting when booking a flight from Osaka to Manila. So we can check this for you, please DM us your booking reference and full name. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks - Lee

@msv1991_mahsa Thanks for getting in touch Mahsa. I'm concerned to hear about your lost baggage and cancelled flight to Fukuoka. We'd like to have a look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can assist you. Regards - Franz
@kamiru_chanmi Thanks for your Tweet. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M

@yittzen Thanks for tagging us. I understand that you need assistance with your boarding pass. So we can check this for you, could you please provide your booking reference and name listed on the booking via DM? Thanks - Jerry
@GreyzDraper Hi Greyz, thanks for the tag. I’m glad to hear that we’re able to locate your baggage and returned it to you safely. We hope to see you on-board again soon! Cheers - Lee

@MohYoesoef Thanks for your tweet Moh. Please note that we can only respond to tweets in English language. Are you able to post your enquiry in English so we can see on how we'll be able to assist you? Thanks - Josh

@raowhiteford Hi Ruth, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you've left your baby blanket onboard. Could you DM us your booking number along with the descriptions of your item and photos if available and will look into this for you. -Jayme

@alyarsa Hi Alya, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you're enquiring regarding your connecting flight. So I could further check this for you, may I please ask you to send us your booking reference via DM? Regards- Yen

@zathiraa Hi Zahra, I understand that you'd like to confirm the airport terminal for your upcoming flights. So we could check, kindly DM us your booking references and full name. For your protection, we advise not to post personal booking details on public page. Regards -Kelly
@AHA1R Hi there, so we can check this, please DM us your booking reference and full name listed on the booking. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks - Maria

@wanwann03 Hi Wanwan. Straight to Gate is available for passengers with no checked baggage and no visa or other entry requirements travelling on selected Jetstar Asia (3K) flights. You may check here for more information: https://t.co/V2tJ0PN3ZK. Thanks - H

data.text: @kevin_leonardi Hi Kevin, I've responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. :) Regards -Kelly
@kevin_leonardi Hi Kevin! Please know that I've responded to your DM. Regards – Mariz
@kevin_leonardi 2/2 Alternatively, you can send us a DM with your complete name and booking number and we'll see if we can assist you about your concern. Thanks - Josh

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @kevin_leonardi 1/2 Thanks for your tweet Kevin and I'm sorry to hear about the long wait whilst trying to contact one of our numbers in Indonesia. Please see this link for the list for phone number we have in Indonesia https://t.co/m0sBKIYGHk.

@PattMikagovich Hi Leona, this video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Thanks - Maria

@xzripro Hi Azri. This video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Regards - H
@alyarsa Hi Alya, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you'd like assistance with the payment on your booking. For privacy purposes could you DM us your full name on the booking? -Jayme

@_Najiehazainal Hi there, This video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand.- Jerry

@rbfnm Hi there, this video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Thanks - Jerry

@NazrynFauzi Hi Nazke, thanks for your tweet. This incident was dealt with when first brought to our attention last 2017. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Hope this clarifies your concerns. Thanks -Cy

@widiasihr Thanks for getting back to us. I'm sorry that you're having some difficulties in purchasing a checked baggage. So we can check how we can assist, please DM us your booking reference and name listed on the booking. Thanks - Jerry
@davidzh7 Hi David, the Social Media Team can only respond to messages in English. Can you resend your tweet in English so I can see how I can assist? Thanks - Maria

@deathbycorn_ Hi Put, thanks for your tweet. I see you need help with rescheduling your flight. Sorry you’re having trouble getting through the website and customer service number. Could you send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can assist? Thanks -Cy

@sanderveraar Thanks for replying, Sander. I recognise that our pilots onboard your may have sounded like Captain Han and Co-pilot Wookie however I hope that this is something that did not make you feel uncomfortable during your recent flight with us. See you soon onboard! :) Thanks - Josh

@sanderveraar Hi Sander thanks for your tweet. Could you DM us more details of your experience with your flight along with your booking reference and full name so we can check on how we can assist you. -Jayme

@_ekattila Hi there, This video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. -Jayme

@notsyafreakoo Hi Syafiq, thanks for your tweet. This incident was dealt with when first brought to our attention last 2017. The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Hope this clarifies your concerns. Thanks -Cy
@widiasihr Hi Diwi, you can add extra baggage allowance via our Manage Booking page here https://t.co/aOyHbIBIsJ. You will need your booking reference and your surname to log in. –M
@_pororofah 6/6 onto the aircraft.I hope this information provides more clarity about the incident. Cheers! –Kelly

@_pororofah 5/6 Jetstar Australia’s aircraft are loaded differently to what you see in the video, which prevents incidents like this occurring. On Jetstar Australia flights, bags are loaded into containers in a secure area with CCTV and then the containers are transported directly

@_pororofah 4/6 the video clip was released by one of ISS Security Staff Members, who is Jetstar’s outsourced security agents. They have been warned of the release as well. As a result of this, AOT has arrested the offender and sent to Saku Police Station accordingly.” I'd like to add that

@_pororofah 3/6 Airport and is part of our security measurement, where an investigator was sent to record this incident.  We have been coordinating this operation with Tourism Police and the concerned parties in the effort to stop such burglary in the aircraft compartment. We suspect that

data.text: @_pororofah 2/6 Thai media on this incident, which is below and our rough translation. “AOT is aware of a video clip circulating on social media regarding the pilferage of passenger bags in aircraft compartment. AOT would like to advise that the incident happened at Phuket International

@_pororofah 1/6 Hi there, we are aware of the video you mentioned about an incident that happened at Phuket airport. The baggage handler you see in the video works for BAGS, which provides baggage services to 90 airlines in Thailand. Airports of Thailand (AOT) has issued a statement to

@khxiriz Hi Khairiz, this video was posted online two years ago and the matter was dealt with back in 2017 when it was first brought to our attention.The baggage handler worked for an external organisation that provides baggage services to more than 90 airlines in Thailand. Thanks - Maria
@SeaFoodin Hi there, I understand that you'd like to change a passenger name. Could you DM us your booking reference along with your full name and I'll take a look at this for you. Thanks – Jayme

@shafbrin Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I see you need help with rescheduling your flight. Sorry you’re having trouble getting through the call centre. Could you send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can assist? Thanks -Cy

@dyah_dw Hi there. Thanks for your tweet and let me assist you in correcting your name on your booking. Kindly send us a DM with your complete name and booking number. I look forward for your DM. Thanks - Josh

@dibyabernie Hi Dibya, thanks for your tweet. Tennis rackets can be brought as carry-on as long as it won’t exceed the size and weight limits here: https://t.co/wPBqWkVn6M. Please note that this is a security item as well. Thanks -Cy

data.text: @cosplayercelty Hi there. I understand that you’re still having trouble re-booking your flight online. We'll be happy to assist you on our end if you’d like. Kindly send us a DM so we can help. Regards - Mariz

@cosplayercelty 1/2 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet and I'm sorry to hear that you were experiencing difficulty whilst trying to rebook your flight online. I've checked this for you and can confirm that there were no outage on our website.

@cosplayercelty 2/2 Kindly ensure that you clear your browser's cache and cookies. Also it's best to use a laptop or desktop computer to access our website using Google Chrome in incognito mode.Thanks - Josh

data.text: @tramaineteo 1/2 Thanks for your tweet Tramaine and I'm sorry to hear about the delay on your flight today. At Jetstar, we certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights.

@1975annmarie I understand how upsetting it is when the service you received didn’t meet your expectations for your flight Manila to Narita and I’m sorry for this. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M

@metabaron Hi there, thanks for the response. It may help to know that we have cabin baggage officers who ensures that passengers are bringing the right amount of luggage - which is 7 kg per passenger. I apologise if the service received was below the standard we aim to provide. - Yen

@metabaron 2/2 impractical for us to expect them to weigh and measure every piece of baggage on all of our flights. As you may appreciate, we do expect our passengers to to take responsibility in meeting their advised baggage allowance as we outline this on their itinerary. Regards -Kelly

@metabaron 1/2 Hi there, I can appreciate that it's frustrating when our staff weren't able to consistently check each passenger's bag. While we would always want our staff to be consistent, checking cabin baggage is generally a very small part of their day-to-day role and it'd be
@windyalc Hi Windy, thanks for your tweet. I have responded to your DM. Thanks – Lee
@thanatos1000 Hi there. If you could DM us your booking reference number along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - H

@GreyzDraper Thanks for getting in touch Greyz. I'm concerned to hear about your lost baggage and I can appreciate how upsetting this might have been for you. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist you further. Regards - Franz

@lhen_dicen I appreciate how disappointing it is when your luggage was lost and I’m very sorry for this. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M

@fathernabss Thanks for tagging us. I understand that you were charged for your excess baggage on your flight with us. So we can check this further for you, could you please DM us your booking reference? We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@itsSDJ Hi there, I have responded to your DM. :) Please check your inbox. Thanks -Kelly
@ha15362 Hi Nicole, I understand that you're having some difficulties checking-in online. So we could check, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Kind Regards -Kelly
@MuqhtarAdamu 6/6 onto the aircraft.I hope this information provides more clarity about the incident. Cheers! -Kelly

@MuqhtarAdamu 5/6 Jetstar Australia’s aircraft are loaded differently to what you see in the video, which prevents incidents like this occurring. On Jetstar Australia flights, bags are loaded into containers in a secure area with CCTV and then the containers are transported directly

@MuqhtarAdamu 4/6 the video clip was released by one of ISS Security Staff Members, who is Jetstar’s outsourced security agents. They have been warned of the release as well. As a result of this, AOT has arrested the offender and sent to Saku Police Station accordingly.” I'd like to add that

@MuqhtarAdamu 3/6 Airport and is part of  our security measurement, where an investigator was sent to record this incident.  We have been coordinating this operation with Tourism Police and the concerned parties in the effort to stop such burglary in the aircraft compartment. We suspect that

data.text: @iLikeDurians 2/2 I would advise you to book using your desktop or using another device. Please let me know how you go. - J

@iLikeDurians 1/2 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are having difficulties selecting flights on our app. I have checked this for you and as of this writing, I can confirm that our app is currently working fine.

@somethngforcat Thanks for getting in touch. I understand that you need assistance with the error on your itinerary. So we can check this for you, please DM us your booking reference and name listed on the booking? Thanks - Jerry
@leowst2012 Thanks for getting in touch Leow. Can you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can look into this for you? Regards - Franz

@clararoxas Hi Clara, thanks for your tweet. Yes, you can pre-purchase baggage via Manage Booking here https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr, or you can also contact our Telephone Reservations team here https://t.co/WyaikGh6hE. Thanks - Lee

@RauzanRahman Thanks for your reply. I recognise this is upsetting for you Rauzan. I can assure you that your feedback is important to us and we will use it so that we can improve our service for you and others in the future. We hope to welcome you back on-board again soon! Thanks - Lee

@RauzanRahman Hi Rauzan, I can appreciate how upsetting it is when recent flight with us was delayed. Safety is our number 1 priority at Jetstar and we take this very seriously. Despite all the efforts we make, sometimes delays are inevitable due to our strict safety standards-F

@akapuregarden Hey, I’ve responded to your DM with further details. Thanks – Lee

@maekaseksihan Hi there.  We appreciate your suggestion about using our GCash payment option and who knows, maybe we can have this feature soon. As of the moment you can always check our website for other payment option offered. Thanks - H

@S_Compensation Hi there. I can tell your frustration about your experience travelling with us and I'm sorry for the inconvenience. So we can look into this further for you, kindly send us your booking reference via DM along with your full name. Thanks - H
